nodes.name: Weekly Monday 09:00

nodes.name: Calculate Date Range

nodes.name: GSC Search Analytics

nodes.name: GA4 Funnel Report

nodes.name: Calculate KPIs & Generate Report

nodes.name: Append to Google Sheets

nodes.name: Send Slack Report
nodes.notes: Sends the Markdown report to configured Slack channel
